title: factory-ts as a project + Agent Personas management
description: Add the local factory-ts package as a first-class project in this workspace and implement UI capability to view and edit Agent personas (name, role, system prompt, defaults).

features.title: Add factory-ts as a project entry
features.description: Ensure the factory-ts local package is recognized as a project in the app so it can be browsed and developed within the workspace. Update any project indexing if necessary to include packages/factory-ts.
features.plan:
- Verify projects indexing includes packages/ subprojects.
- If needed, add an entry so factory-ts appears in project selector.
acceptance: factory-ts appears as a selectable project in the app (or projects list)

features.title: Personas list and editor (Agents)
features.description: Create a screen to view, create, edit, and delete Agent personas used by the orchestrator. Each persona includes: id, name, description/role, system prompt, default provider/model, temperature, and optional tools/permissions. Implement storage under .factory/personas.json.
features.plan:
- Define PersonasStore interface under src/renderer/services.
- Add UI under Agents screen: list personas, edit modal/form.
- Wire save/load to local storage file .factory/personas.json.
acceptance: Users can see a list of personas with name and role
Users can create a new persona and it persists
Users can edit an existing persona's fields and save
